data.expected_result: There's a Discord logo in background on light theme like there is when using Dark theme
data.short_description: There is no image loading background while using light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - switch to light theme - go and try to load an image (it'll be easier to notice if you're on a slower connection) - notice there's no loading image background like there is with dark theme (has two Discord logos and a spinning circle icon infront of them)
